'''Waveriding Adventurer (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Liffey Region]] and the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
